content.query:
CREATE TABLE dwh_core.project_dimension (
    [ProjectKey] INT PRIMARY KEY,
    [ProjectName] NVARCHAR(255),
    [ProjectStart] DATE,
    [ProjectEnd] DATE,
    [RevenueGenerated] INT
);


CREATE TABLE dwh_core.developer_dimension (
    [DeveloperKey] INT PRIMARY KEY,
    [DeveloperName] NVARCHAR(255),
    [DeveloperRole] NVARCHAR(255)
);


CREATE TABLE dwh_core.jira_git_fact (
    [JiraGitKey] INT,
    [JiraTicketKey] INT,
    [DeveloperKey] INT,
    [StoryPoint] INT,
    [GitHubRepo] NVARCHAR(255),
    [CommitMessage] NVARCHAR(1000),
    [CommitTime] DATETIME,
    [ProjectName] NVARCHAR(255)
);


CREATE TABLE dwh_staging.jira_git_fact (
    [JiraGitKey] INT,
    [JiraTicketKey] INT,
    [DeveloperKey] INT,
    [StoryPoint] INT,
    [GitHubRepo] NVARCHAR(255),
    [CommitMessage] NVARCHAR(1000),
    [CommitTime] DATETIME,
    [ProjectName] NVARCHAR(255)
);
